Infectra

*Infectra smiles and looks into Airbomber's optics. She slides cl=
oser to him and than kisses him*

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: T=
HECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, August 08, 2000 8:08 PM
=
  Subject: Re: The End is Still Near, and is now close...


  t to Infectra=
. He looks her in the eyes and smiles...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
=
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Tuesday, A=
ugust 08, 2000 5:22 AM
    Subject: Re: The End is Still Near, and is now c=
lose...


    Airbomber sits nexInfectra/Twister/Blizzard


    *Infectra s=
miles and sits on the bed and pats it wanting Airbomber to join her*

    (=
OOC: No one start yelling about, Bots can't have babies that way, because I=
'm not aiming for that. Just saying this in case someone jumps to conclusio=
ns.)



    *Twister stands behind Sinesis and can see he was getting angry=
. She just stands there hoping that someone would please notice them*



  =
  *Blizzard follows Sinister and stands next to him looking around. Hoping =
that they would be noticed*

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From=
: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, August 08, 20=
00 5:07 AM
      Subject: The End is Still Near, and is now close...


    =
  Deemos seen Inzola wasn't going to talk to him and walked outside to conf=
ront her.

      "That's it, bitch, I'm sick of you!" Deemos said.

      I=
nzola laughed. She had been charging her cannon for days, now she knew what=
 to use it on. Deemos had alos been charging his cannon for days, and had t=
he same idea as Inzola.

      "You love me or hate me, which one is it?" D=
eemos said angrily. Inzola pulled the cannon up at the same time as Deemos.=
 They both fired. Both of them had surprised faces as they blew each other =
apart, their pieces scattering in front of the Maximal base...

      Gango=
n, still out of action.

      Artist walked away from the Maximal base. He=
 could tell that Plintissa missed Iron Raptor, she was her only friend, aft=
er all. Dracona's words hurt Plintissa more than you could think.

      La=
nd Mine, BLEEDING TO DEATH!

      Time Bomb, LOOKING FOR LAND MINE!

     =
 Stranato sits around all day in his new room, playing Monopoly with himsel=
f.

      "I landed on my Citadel! I pay myself 2000 dollars!" Stranato sai=
d, taking money from the bank and laughing.

      Airbomber looked at Infe=
ctra, in their room they were in privacy.

      "What do you want to do?" =
Airbomber asked Infectra with a smile.

      Sinesis got mad. He was reall=
y sick of this. He wanted someone to answer him!

      "Predacon commander=
! I wish to join!" Sinesis said angrily. (If Blackarachnia is in command, t=
hen please respond, JP.)

      Sinister knocked on the Maximal bases door.=
..

      Etchingar sighed and walked inside of the base. He started lookin=
g under everything for loose change.

      A stasis pod falls out in the m=
iddle of nowhere, and please make the scanners pick it up, PLEASE!!!...

--=
---------------------------------------------------------------------------=
-
